Text: RE El Paso Status in the Exotic Files Cc for writing I discussed this matter with George Huan this morning in person and he tells me that he rebooked the deals originally booked to El Paso Merchant Energy Gas LP to El Paso Merchant Energy LP correctly in his spreadsheet pretty late last night after you spoke with him and so it did not get into our system last night He has assured me however that everything is in order for tonights run and that the problem should be fixed Monday I will advise you if the situation is unresolved Monday Thanks for your follow up Sue Original Message From McLaughlin Errol Sent Thursday April PM To Vasan Sue Subject El Paso Status in the Exotic Files Sue I am sending you this email because I received your voice message well after you left it today I reviewed the text files that are sent out by the book administrators on my desks and none of them contain any deals booked to the counterparty El Paso Gas Marketing All of the deals from people on my desk are booked to the valid El Paso counterparty per our conversations I will be out of the office tomorrow but I will be checking my voicemail frequently and communicating with my group If the same problem arises tomorrow please call me at so that we can discuss because there has to be some other explanation for the erroneous counterparty showing up on your report Thank you Errol McLaughlin X

Implementation of Revised Spreadsheet Format Cc PST Thanks to everyone for your help and support this past week as we worked through the process of taking the new spreadsheet format requiring the use of the Counterparty ID instead of the ERMS Short Name into production The credit for a successful implementation goes to each and everyone of you Going forward please bear the following points in mind There is a minor change to the manner in which the spreadsheets will load into RisktRAC If the new validation routine does not find any errors in your spreadsheet it will immediately load the positions into RisktRAC without prompting you to confirm and insert the spreadsheet into our tables When you see the final confirmation message the position has already been loaded into our deal tables Please make sure that you have only numeric values ie valid counteparty IDs in column F externalcpID and column G internalcpID Any alpha values in these two colums will produce a fatal error and the system will not accept your spreadsheet until you input a valid counterparty ID Please obtain access to the Global Counterparty system to look up valid Counterparty IDs for any new counterparties that you might add to your spreadsheet in the future If you have any questions or concerns please feel free to call me Thank you Sue Vasan
